title: Byrne Power: L'Abri Lecture: The Need For Beauty: Roger Scruton Tarkovsky Jordan Peterson Rookmaaker
description:
This lecture, entitled The Need For Beauty, is an exploration of the meaning of beauty in our lives. And the effects of its absence in the 21st Century. It covers beauty in nature, architecture, art, the human body and in human conversation. This lecture was given the L'Abri Fellowship in Huémoz, Switzerland on November 4th 2018. 

Some of the topics and names mentioned: The Meaning Of Beauty, Roger Scruton's Ideas on Beauty, Andrei Tarkovsky's ideas about beauty in art, Hans Rookmaaker's defense of beauty, cosmetic surgery, deformity, freaks, art, the image of both men and women as beauty, nature, architecture, Christian ideas and misconceptions about beauty, and many other topics. 
......

My other YouTube channel is this one: https://www.youtube.com/user/gulagzero 
The Anadromous Life essay site for more in depth ideas: https://theanadromist.wordpress.com/ 
The Gravity From Above site for more artistic ideas involving puppetry, music, dance and other arts. https://gravityfromabove.wordpress.com/ 
And if you want to communicate with me use The Anadromous Life Facebook page. https://www.facebook.com/theanadromist/ 

(I don't want to have to make my personal page private because I have too many 'friends'. If it's dialogue you want go there. I'll start 'community' page soon enough if the demand is there.) 

And check out my new Georgian Crossroads channel!
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeFJ6Tm71ieNcjcUb-Trc8g

Thanks for watching, more coming soon! 
Meanwhile dig into the Anadromous past. Swim against the stream my friends. 

From Tbilisi Georgia (Look it up on a map!) 
Byrne
